name: Neko - Your Cute Onscreen Pet
description:
Neko is a recreation of a famous onscreen cat app which came out for the original Macintosh in the early 1980s.

Neko uses ideas made available by NAD Labs. Neko is open source software, with the source code available on GitLab.

Neko is licenced under the GNU Public Licence v3. Enjoy!
